Literature.Title: Structure and antibacterial activities of new cyclic peptide antibiotics, pargamicins B, C and D, from Amycolatopsis sp. ML1-hF4.
Literature.Author: Hashizume H, Sawa R, Yamashita K, Nishimura Y, Igarashi M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus 209P(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Smith(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis JCM 5803(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12201(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12203(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium JCM 5804(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium NCTC 12202(MIC=1µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus FDA 16(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus IFO 3333(MIC=1µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis NRRL B-558(MIC=1µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis PCI 219(MIC=1µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=2µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10702(MIC=1µg/ml),Corynebacterium bovis 1810(MIC=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli NIHJ(MIC=>64µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>64µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae JS11910(MIC=>64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 1891(MIC=>64µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris OX19(MIC=>64µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis IFM OM-9(MIC=>64µg/ml),Serratia marcescens B-0524(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae PCI 602(MIC=>64µg/ml)
